attributes.title: Venom Cures Cancer?
attributes.caption: Let's face it, symbiotes gets around and Venom has certainly been around the celestial block once or twice. ​Jocelyn takes us through the history of Venom and some of the interesting Marvel heroes the symbiote has come in close contact with.
attributes.description: Let's face it, symbiotes gets around and Venom has certainly been around the celestial block once or twice. Jocelyn takes us through the history of Venom and some of the interesting Marvel heroes the symbiote has come in close contact with.

attributes.title: Stupid Superhero PSAs
attributes.caption: Over the years our favorite superheroes have taught us about a lot of important issues. However, sometimes the way they do it is down right stupid!
attributes.description: Over the years our favorite superheroes have taught us about a lot of important issues. However, sometimes the way they do it is down right stupid!

attributes.title: WORST Onomatopoeia in Comics
